title: [Bug] DownloadOperation paused at 100% restarts from 0 when resumed
body: DownloadOperation (BackgroundTransfer API) restarts from 0 when resumed after being paused at 100% (progress.bytesReceived == progress.totalBytesToReceive and startAsync task hasn't completed). I've noticed after the pause that the downloadOperation.resultFile contains all data which I assume it means download finished while we were pausing it.
